translations.Please select input video and output loc: Please select input video and output location first!
translations.Please draw a box around the object on t: Please draw a box around the object on the screen first.
translations.tip_ai:
Select the AI brain:
- Caffe: Best balance.
- TensorFlow: Slower but catches difficult angles.
- Haar: Very fast, but mainly for frontal faces.
translations.tip_conf:
Sets the AI sensitivity.
- Lower value = Detects more faces (even blurry/dark ones).
- Higher value = Strict detection for clear faces only.
translations.tip_mem:
Number of frames the pixelation remains if a face quickly turns away or is obstructed.
Prevents pixelation 'flickering' during fast motion.
translations.tip_blocks:
Percentage of the pixel block size relative to the face.
Ensures pixelation remains strong and consistent even if the camera zooms in.
translations.tip_pad:
Percentage to expand the pixelated box around the face/object.
Ensures edges are fully covered even if the camera zooms in.
